Şerh-i İsagoci
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Missing one leaf or leaves at the beginning.
Written in one column, 21 lines per pages in black rubricated in red.
كدلالة الانسان على قابل العلم وصنعة الكتاب حال ارادة الحيوان الناطق منه فان قلت لا نسلم ان دلالة الانسان على قابل العلم... :Incipit
تمت الكتاب بعون الله الملك الوهاب سنة اثنى وثمانون ومائه والف محرم شهر اليوم وحدة وعشرون وبعد الظهر وقبل العصر تمت. :Colophon
According to the colophon (f. 50v), copy completed on 25 Muharram 1182 [June 10, 1768].
MS Arab 436. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
With this is bound: al-Risālah al-kubrá fī al-manṭiq [al-Risālah al-waladīyah] / al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī (ff. 51v-60v).
